scripts.build:baidu-so:linux: CARGO_TARGET_DIR=build/baidu_verify-build/linux cargo build --release --manifest-path src-tauri/baidu_verify/Cargo.toml && mkdir -p build/baidu_verify/linux dist/baidu_verify/linux && cp build/baidu_verify-build/linux/release/libbaidu_verify.so build/baidu_verify/linux/libbaidu_verify.so && cp build/baidu_verify-build/linux/release/libbaidu_verify.so dist/baidu_verify/linux/libbaidu_verify.so
scripts.build:baidu-so:windows: powershell -Command "$env:CARGO_TARGET_DIR='build/baidu_verify-build\windows'; cargo build --release --manifest-path src-tauri/baidu_verify/Cargo.toml; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'build/baidu_verify\windows','dist/baidu_verify\windows' | Out-Null; Copy-Item 'build/baidu_verify-build\windows\release\baidu_verify.dll' -Destination 'build/baidu_verify\windows\baidu_verify.dll' -Force; Copy-Item 'build/baidu_verify-build\windows\release\baidu_verify.dll' -Destination 'dist/baidu_verify\windows\baidu_verify.dll' -Force"
